duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive financial planning and consulting services to a wide range of clients.
Build and develop a business in financial planning and consulting.
Start on a part-time basis with potential for immediate leadership advancement.
Grow a team of agents and leverage company resources and industry experts.
Offer retirement strategies, estate planning, tax deductions, college funding, wealth preservation, insurance protection, business planning, and corporate group plans.
Create and manage a flexible schedule for training and client interactions.
Weave the opportunity into current schedules and prepare to go full-time within a year.
Participate in a competitive training program, mentorship, and professional development training throughout the career.
Promote diversity, teamwork, work-life balance, recognition, and rewards as part of the company culture.
Utilize comprehensive planning analysis tools, brokerage and advisory platforms, as well as wealth management.
Build a business with the help of the company's resources.

education_certification.credential: Willingness to obtain a state license if not already obtained
